chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: Type
f: union_map [ordType of nat] V
v: V
i: Ordered.sort [ordType of nat]
w: V

Goal:
valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)

Premises:
Notation union_map := UMDef.tp
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (base c)). Record type : Type := Pack { sort : Type; _ : class_of sort } Definition sort : ordType -> Type. Definition class
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fresh = fun f : union_map [ordType of nat] V => (last_key f).+1 : union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
valid_fresh : forall (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), valid (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = valid f
dom_ordfresh : forall (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x < fresh f
dom_freshn : forall (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (n : nat), fresh f + n \notin dom f
last_key_max : forall (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x <= last_key f
last_keyUnf : forall f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V, valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f2 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_keyfUn : forall f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V, valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f1 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_key = fun f : union_map [ordType of nat] V => last 0 (dom f) : union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
max_key_last : forall (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
dom_fresh : forall f : union_map [ordType of nat] V, fresh f \notin dom f
last_key_dom : forall f : union_map [ordType of nat] V, valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
dom_last_key : forall f : union_map [ordType of nat] V, valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
big_pmorph : forall (R1 : Type) (R2 : pcm) (f : R2 -> R1) (id1 : R1) (op1 : R1 -> R1 -> R1), (forall x y : R2, valid (x \+ y) -> f (x \+ y) = op1 (f x) (f y)) -> f Unit = id1 -> forall (I : Type) (r : seq I) (P : pred I) (F : I -> R2), valid (bigop.BigOp.bigop Unit r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i PCM.join (P i) (F i))) -> f (bigop.BigOp.bigop Unit r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i PCM.join (P i) (F i))) = bigop.BigOp.bigop id1 r (fun i : I => bigop.BigBody i op1 (P i) (f (F i)))
hist_path : forall f : union_map [ordType of nat] V, path oleq 0 (dom f)
umE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType), (forall (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V), (k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2) = (k1 == k2) && (v1 == v2)) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (k \\-> v == Unit) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (Unit == k \\-> v) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (k \\-> v == um_undef) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V), (um_undef == k \\-> v) = false) * ((Unit == um_undef) = false) * ((um_undef == Unit) = false) * (forall (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (...
umUPtPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (f \+ k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umUPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (f \+ k \\-> v == Unit) = false
last_key0 = (fun _evar_0_ : last 0 (UM.dom (UMC.from UMC.empty)) = 0 => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nat] => last 0 _pattern_value_ = 0) _evar_0_ (UMC.domE UMC.empty)) ((fun _evar_0_ : last 0 (UM.dom (UMC.from (UMC.to (UM.empty V (cond (union_mapUMC [ordType of nat] V)))))) = 0 => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : union_mapUMC [ordType of nat] V => last 0 (UM.dom (UMC.from _pattern_value_)) = 0) _evar_0_ (UMC.emptyE (union_mapUMC [ordType of nat] V))) ((fun _evar_0_ : last 0 (UM.dom (UM.empty V (cond (union_mapUMC [ordType...
last_key_mono : forall f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V, {subset dom f1 <= dom f2} -> last_key f1 <= last_key f2
validUnPtV : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (f \+ pts k v) -> valid f
umPtUPt2E : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 == f \+ k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umPtPtUE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 == k2 \\-> v2 \+ f) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umPtUPtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k1 k2 : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k1 \\-> v1 \+ f == k2 \\-> v2) = [&& k1 == k2, v1 == v2 & empb f]
umPtUE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k \\-> v \+ f == Unit) = false
localV : forall (U : pcm) (f : U -> U -> option U) (x y r : U), local f -> valid (x \+ y) -> f x y = Some r -> valid (r \+ y)
last_keyPt : forall (x : nat) (v : V), last_key (x \\-> v) = x
validPtUnV : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) -> valid f
findPtUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) -> find k (pts k v \+ f) = Some v
validAR : forall (U : pcm) (x y z : U), valid (x \+ y \+ z) -> valid (y \+ z)
validAL : forall (U : pcm) (x y z : U), valid (x \+ (y \+ z)) -> valid (x \+ y)
um0PtE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V), (Unit == k \\-> v) = false
